channel.title: ToolsforCausality on Causal ML with DoubleML
channel.description: Recent content in ToolsforCausality on Causal ML with DoubleML

item.title: Welcome, Tools for Causality
item.description: Tools for Causality - Double Machine Learning Welcome to the DoubleML course in the “Tools for Causality” school taking place in Autrans/Grenoble (FR) on September 25 to 29, 2023. On this website you’ll find all materials that are used during the tutorial. We will share the materials with participants here just before the tutorial starts. Day 1: Basics of Double Machine Learning Introduction to Causal Machine Learning and Double Machine Learning, Slides Introduction to Causal Machine Learning with DoubleML for Python Slides Heterogeneous Treatment Effects with DoubleML Slides Shiny app Key Ingredients of Double Machine Learning Notebook Uplift Modeling Notebook Demand Elasticity Notebook (.
